mapper.select: SELECT LOWER(ct.alpha_two_code) AS "alphaTwoCode", ct.country_name AS "countryName", mt.landmark AS "landmark", mt.latitude AS "latitude", mt.longitude AS "longitude", mt.img_url AS "imgUrl" FROM country_code_tb ct, earth_marker_tb mt WHERE ct.alpha_two_code = mt.alpha_two_code ORDER BY ct.country_name ASC
